name: bug_scrub_to_csv

inputs.name: input_filename
inputs.description: Unicode-8 Text File of GDC Bug Scrub

inputs.name: output_filename
inputs.description: Name of the Output CSV (Should End in .csv)

author: nimbhasi
description:
This script accepts the GDC AS Bug Scrub, in Unicode-8 format (hint: Save As in MS Word) and produces an easy to read CSV file with the following information, for all the bug-IDs present in the bug scrub:

Bug-ID, AS Severity, Headline, CDETS URL, CloudApps URL, Fixed Releases
